item.title: SAG Awards: Winners revealed on a glittering night in LA
item.description: Conclave and Shogun took the top honours in film and TV while Jane Fonda accepted a lifetime achievement award

item.title: Trump names podcaster Dan Bongino as deputy FBI director
item.description: The former New York City police officer will supervise daily operations and serve under new FBI director Kash Patel.

item.title: Sudan army ends two-year siege of key city
item.description: The Sudan army captures el-Obeid hours after rival RSF forces signed a charter for a breakaway government.

item.title: Friedrich Merz: Risk-taker who flirted with far right
item.description: The leader of the Christian Democratic Union is now in pole position to become Germany's next chancellor.

item.title: Pope still critical after 10th night in hospital, Vatican says
item.description: The pontiff, under care for respiratory and kidney problems, "slept and is resting," the Vatican said.
